refnamediv.refpurpose: Perform a lookup on the original un-preprocessed filename

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
stringprep_get_file stringfrom_file
When a PHP script is preprocessed, the result of the preprocessor command is stored in a temporary file, and the original file is preserved.
prep_get_file is used to retrieve the temporary file name from the original file name (such as __FILE__).

&reftitle.returnvalues;
The temporary file name; &false; on failure
